date.precise_date: First day of the Eternal Dawn
date.duration: Seven days and seven nights, though experienced differently across timelines

description.brief: A cosmic event where all possible timelines briefly converged into a single moment, fundamentally altering the nature of time and reality in the PrimalMyst universe.
description.detailed: The Great mystical Convergence occurred when the natural flow of time became disrupted by the accumulated paradoxes of the First Age. All possible past, present, and future timelines collapsed into a single point of existence at the Nexus Observatory. During this convergence, the barriers between what was, what is, and what could be dissolved completely. Every soul experienced all possible versions of their life simultaneously, and every choice that had ever been made or could be made existed in the same moment. The event lasted seven days from an external perspective, but those who lived through it experienced lifetimes of possibility.
description.prelude: Strange mystical anomalies had been increasing throughout the Second Age. Seers reported visions of multiple futures occurring simultaneously, and scholars noted increasing instances of paradoxes that refused to resolve themselves naturally.
description.aftermath: The Convergence fundamentally changed the relationship between time and consciousness in the world. Many individuals retained memories of alternate timelines, leading to the emergence of the mist-walker race and the founding of the mystical Guardians.

primary_characters.role: Newly awakened mist-walker who helped stabilize the convergence
primary_characters.outcome: Gained his mystical abilities and was chosen as the first Timekeeper

primary_characters.role: Ancient seer who predicted the convergence
primary_characters.outcome: Transcended physical form and became one with the timestream

factions.outcome: Evolved into the official mystical Guardians organization
Many gained the ability to perceive multiple timelines

other_entities: The Cosmic Weaver - primordial entity of time and fate
mystical Spirits - beings of pure time energy

causes.description: Accumulation of unresolved mystical paradoxes from the First Age
Natural cycle of mystical realignment that occurs every cosmic age

consequences.description: Creation of the mist-walker race - beings with innate mystical sensitivity
Establishment of the mystical Guardians to prevent future convergences
Many individuals retained memories of alternate lives, leading to philosophical and religious upheavals
Certain locations became permanently mystical anomalies, existing in multiple time states

sources.description: The Convergence Chronicles - firsthand accounts from survivors compiled by the mystical Guardians
mystical echoes preserved in Chronicle Crystals at the Nexus Observatory
mystical residue found at convergence sites across multiple dimensions

prophecies.text: When all hours become one hour, and all choices become one choice, the children of time shall be born from the union of what was and what shall be.
In the moment when time stands still, the guardians of tomorrow shall rise from the ashes of yesterday.
